Now that Christmas is just weeks away many are scrambling to find gifts for all their loved ones PERIOD Even with racks and racks of items and potential presents lining the shelves in every store gift giving can still be the most stressful part of the holidays PERIOD

It doesnt have to be though if you just know where to look PERIOD

If you are looking for a gift for a woman there are a few places you can look that have everything from stocking stuffers to gifts on a grander scale

Victorias Secret is a goto for lingerie pajamas and beauty products PERIOD It also offers deals like  off a purchase free panties and free shipping on certain orders when you buy from their Web site www.victoriassecret.com PERIOD

If you arent comfortable buying a girl a lacey babydoll negligee for Christmas but still want to be flirty try picking up something from the brands PINK collection PERIOD A set of cozy slippers and a pair of Cheekster undies would be a great affordable gift but if youre willing to splurge try something from the brands West Virginia University collection PERIOD

Want something more sophisticated for your lady Try a Pandora bracelet which can be purchased at www.pandorajewelry.com PERIOD

The Pandora bracelet can be purchased for as low as  and can be personalized with the charms of your choosing PERIOD This is a great gift because its classy but not too expensive and you can always add to it by purchasing new charms for birthdays anniversaries or other special occasions PERIOD

For guys gift giving can be as easy as following the fashion trends PERIOD

Watches are making a resurgence as a musthave accessory and the Fossil Stark Palindrome Too watch is a stylish and modern option for the reasonable price of  PERIOD It features duel dials that track the days hours and minutes and comes in two color combinations playful gray and orange or the maturelooking black on black PERIOD

Whether a guys style is spoton or a little eccentric its still safe to say he loves a good Tshirt PERIOD CXXVI Tshirts combine comfort with trendy yet unconventional designs that should appeal to any man and they run for an easy  a piece PERIOD

Parents and guardians can be a little harder to shop for but stores like J PERIOD Crew Gap and Old Navy offer plenty of affordable options for both sexes so you can get all your parental shopping done in one place PERIOD

Need a gift for an acquaintance A scarf is always a safe option PERIOD Stick with simple plaid or striped patterns when buying for men and look at floral and paisley options for women PERIOD

No matter what you buy your loved ones this year keep in mind what the seasons really about PERIOD Gift giving should be an enjoyable task so try not to turn into a Scrooge while youre shopping this season PERIOD
